name: Oblivious (mrmav)
description:
Oblivious is a game about trying to clear mazes and defeating monsters.

This was a game developed for the Zenva Academy Hackathon in 2017, winning the 2nd place.

Known issues in itch.io upload: If the game window loses focus, it's not possible to give it back. Fix: Refresh the page solves this issue.
